ServerProperties.Properties_CfgMayOverride: CFG 文件可能會覆蓋這些值，請務必檢查
ServerProperties.Properties_CustomGameMod: 自定義 遊戲 / 模組
ServerProperties.Properties_WorkshopCustomMap: 工作坊 / 自定義 地圖{LB}(使用額外參數進行調整)
ServerProperties.Properties_NormalRecommendedRealtimeNotR: 建議選擇標準、不建議選擇即時
ServerProperties.Properties_ServerPropertiesCannotBeChang: 運作時無法更改伺服器屬性
ServerProperties.CreateServerCFGInfo: Since server.cfg executes automatically, it will not appear in the Execute CFG drop-down.
ServerProperties.StartThisServerWhenSedirectorStarts: 當 seDirector 啟動時啟動本伺服器
ServerProperties.ValidateUpdate: Validate update every time (adds the -validate parameter to SteamCMD).{LB}{LB}Use this if your servers aren't updating or working properly.
ServerProperties.OnlyUpdateIfServerHas0Players: Only update automatically if the server has 0 players
ServerProperties.UpdateAutoCurMapCurPlayers: 自動更新, 目前地圖, 目前玩家
ServerProperties.SaveAndReopen: Save and reopen to change these settings
ServerProperties.PluginDescription: seDirector can update your server automatically when Steam's content servers change. For these features to work, you must have SourceMod installed prior to installing this plugin (except if game server is Garry's Mod).{LB}{LB}The seDirector plugin also updates the 'Current Map' and 'Players' columns on the server list.
ServerProperties.HowCrashRecoveryWorks: How crash recovery works:{LB}seDirector keeps count of how many times a server has crashed.  If a server has crashed 2 times in 10 minutes, seDirector will automatically try to update the server.  If the server crashes again within 10 minutes after the update, seDirector will stop the server.  If a server has gone more than 10 minutes without crashing, the crash counter will reset.{LB}{LB}1 crash in 10 minutes = okay{LB}2 crashes in 10 minutes = attempt to update{LB}1 crash in 10 minutes after updating = server will stop (notification sent if enabled){LB}Every 10 minutes without a crash = count resets
ServerProperties.RestartServerIndefinitely: 無限期地重新啟動服務器
ServerProperties.RestartServerIndefinitelyExplained: 如果選中此框，它將禁用重新啟動、更新然後停止的傳統崩潰恢復方法。相反，您的服務器每次崩潰時都會重新啟動。如果服務器損壞並繼續崩潰，此選項將允許其繼續。{LB}{LB}注意：{LB}- 通常崩潰是由於插件/插件造成的，應該診斷並解決問題{LB}-嘗試更新所有插件、插件和遊戲文件；暫時選中“每次驗證更新”複選框並更新{LB} - 如果選中，則禁用所有通知以防止在發生崩潰循環時發送垃圾郵件
ServerProperties.NotificationsDisabledRestartServerIndefi: 禁用通知{LB}在自動化中選中無限期重新啟動服務器
ServerProperties.Name: Name
ServerProperties.SaveAndReopenToChange: Save and reopen to change these settings
ServerProperties.AddonsNotSupported: 此遊戲伺服器不支援外掛程式
ServerProperties.RunScriptExeAndGetRequestRequiresSubscri: 禁用項目需要 Pro 訂閱或更高版本
ServerProperties.MakeGetRequestToURL: 向 URL 發出 GET 請求
ServerProperties.OnAnEventRequiresSubscription: 參加活動需要專業版或更高版本的訂閱
ServerProperties.RestartServer2: 使用遊戲內通知重新啟動伺服器 (需使用外掛程式)
ServerProperties.UpdateServer2: 使用遊戲內通知更新伺服器 (需使用外掛程式)
ServerProperties.RunScriptOrExecutable: 運行腳本或可執行文件
ServerProperties.BZ2CompressionExplained: BZ2 compression allows content to be downloaded to a player's computer much faster than downloading the traditional BSP files. It is similar to a ZIP file except it ends in BZ2. The files are created in the same directory as the content.
ServerProperties.AutoCompressUncompressed: Automatically compress uncompressed content on server start
ServerProperties.HTTPFastDownloadExplained: You may enable Directory Synchronization and/or FTP/SFTP Synchronization so that your content is automatically updated on your web server every time this server is started. Sync works by mirroring the maps, sound, materials, model, and resource directories. If target directories already exist they will be updated to match this server's content. Only BZ2 files will be synced.
ServerProperties.HTTPFastDownloadExplained2: Create a new, empty directory on your web server and specify its location below.
ServerProperties.DirSyncHTTP: Directory Synchronization for HTTP Fast Download
ServerProperties.DirSyncHTTP3: Generally used if your web server is on the same computer as your game server(s)
ServerProperties.FTPSFTPSync: FTP/SFTP Synchronization for HTTP Fast Download
ServerProperties.SFTPRecommended: SFTP is recommended because it encrypts your credentials
ServerProperties.EmailTextSMS2: seDirector will automatically notify you via e-mail if your server crashes and is unable to be recovered automatically OR if a server fails to start successfully. The 'Recover from server crash' checkbox on the Automation tab MUST be checked in order for e-mail notifications to work.
ServerProperties.DiscordNotifications2: seDirector will automatically notify you via Discord if your server crashes and is unable to be recovered automatically OR if a server fails to start successfully. The 'Recover from server crash' checkbox on the Automation tab MUST be checked in order for Discord notifications to work.
ServerProperties.HowDoI: How do I get a webhook?
ServerProperties.VariablesMsgBox: {NAME} - 服務器名稱{LB}{MAP} - 當前地圖{LB}{PLAYERS} - 當前玩家人數

Options.WLMI: seDirector 使用計劃任務在該用戶登錄 Windows 時自動啟動。如果此用戶帳戶有密碼，您可以使用 Sysinternals 的 Autologon 等工具在 Windows 啟動時自動登錄。
Options.MTSTOC: 關閉時最小化到系統列
Options.DNCCP: 不檢查目前玩家和地圖
Options.CDS: 在桌面建立 seDirector 捷徑
Options.CSMS: 在開始功能表建立 seDirector 選單
Options.HTSWAUC: 如何在啟動UAC但不顯示UAC提示的情況下啟動seDirector
Options.UseBaiduInsteadOfGoogle: 使用百度而不是谷歌來檢查互聯網連接
Options.UseDiscordRelay: 使用 Discord 中繼（如果 ISP 阻止訪問 Discord）
Options.ComputerNameMoreInfo: Identifies the computer that seDirector is running on. Currently used in notifications to help determine which computer sent the notification.
Options.RecommendedFolder: 點選查看 seDirector 建議的資料夾結構
Options.SteamLoginDesc: 非強制性，僅在某些遊戲或是進行進階操作時才需要

CreateServer.DirectoryNotEmptyOverwrite: Directory is not empty. Files may be overwritten! Proceed?
CreateServer.UserPassReqToUpdate: A username and password for Steam is required to update this game. Please set it in Tools->Options and return to this window.
CreateServer.DownloadsForGameCurrentlyDisabled: 目前該遊戲的下載已被禁用。您想查看{0}以了解更多信息嗎？
CreateServer.CopyingTf2cZip: 將 TF2 Classic zip 解壓文件夾複製到服務器
CreateServer.DownloadLatestedTf2c: 您想下載 TF2 Classic 遊戲文件嗎？如果您已經下載過一次 TF2 Classic，它不會再次重新下載，只會提取最新的遊戲文件，直到檢測到新版本為止。{LB}{LB}如果您尚未下載 TF2之前在這台計算機上的經典遊戲文件（5 GB）在 500 Mbps 連接上大約需要 10 分鐘，在 250 Mbps 連接上需要 20 分鐘，在 100 Mbps 連接上需要 50 分鐘。
CreateServer.ErrorWhenDownloadingTf2c: 下載 TF2 Classic zip 文件時出錯
CreateServer.SelectTf2cFolderCopyExtractedZip: 選擇要復制的 tf2classic 文件夾（從 zip 中提取）。
CreateServer.Tf2cNotDetectedCopyAnyway: 在此文件夾中未檢測到 TF2 Classic。我們建議您單擊“否”並下載最新版本。{LB}{LB}您仍想從此文件夾複製嗎？

CreateServer.TF2CDownloaderDoesNotExist: TF2 Classic 下載器不存在。請轉至“幫助”>“報告錯誤”來報告錯誤。

Options.DefaultDirToBrowse: The 'Default Directory to Browse' setting tells seDirector to automatically open to the specified directory automatically when browsing for a file or folder. That way you don't have to go through Computer->C Drive->Steam->etc every time, it will automatically open to the directory you set it to.
Options.SedWillReloadLang: seDirector 現在將使用語言 {0} 重新加載。您的服務器將保持運行。

ServerConfig.CouldNotDetectSteamInf: Couldn't detect steam.inf in game directory. Please open Properties and select srcds.exe again. If the problem persists, turn on the -validate update option in properties and update, then turn it back off.
ServerConfig.CouldNotLocateSteamInf: Could not locate steam.inf in game directory.
ServerConfig.ThisServerFailedToStartSuccessfully: This server failed to start successfully.
ServerConfig.ErrorLoadingServersXML: There was an error loading the Servers.xml data file. This could be caused by a bug in seDirector. If Servers.xml is empty, delete the file and either restore it from a backup or add your servers back to seDirector manually. Please email support@sedirector.net and let us know what you were doing in seDirector right before this happened. Attach Servers.xml to your email if it is NOT empty.
ServerConfig.TF2CUpdateNotSupportedYet: 尚不支持 TF2C 更新。現在，您可以使用遊戲目錄的更新選項運行 TF2C 下載程序。

SupportRequest.MessageSent: Your message has been sent. Please allow 1 to 2 business days for a reply. Thank you.
SupportRequest.ErrorSendingInformation: There was an error sending the information. Check your Internet connection and contact support@sedirector.net if the problem persists.

MainWindow.AllServersMustBeOfflineToRunThisTest: All servers must be stopped (in the Offline state) to run this test.

DiscordBot.RequiresSubscription: Discord 機器人需要 Pro 訂閱或更高版本。
DiscordBot.AuthenticationFailed: Discord 機器人身份驗證失敗。請檢查您的令牌並在必要時重置它。
DiscordBot.NoToken: 您可以在沒有令牌的情況下保存這些設置，但在您設置令牌之前，Discord 機器人將無法工作。
DiscordBot.Step1: 如果需要，請轉到此處登錄：
DiscordBot.Step2: 點擊右上角“新建應用程序”
DiscordBot.Step5: 單擊左側的“OAuth2”菜單選項，然後單擊“URL Generator”菜單選項
DiscordBot.Step6: 檢查“範圍”下的“機器人”選項
DiscordBot.Step7: 選中以下權限旁邊的框：
DiscordBot.Step7b1: 檢查此列中的所有權限
DiscordBot.Step7c1: 不勾選該欄的任何權限
DiscordBot.Step8: 將底部生成的 URL 複製到此框中
DiscordBot.Step9: 返回網絡瀏覽器，單擊左側的“機器人”菜單選項
DiscordBot.Step10: 單擊“添加機器人”，然後單擊“是的，執行此操作！”
DiscordBot.Step11: 重要提示：關閉“公共機器人”並單擊“保存更改”
DiscordBot.Step12: 在特權網關意圖下，打開狀態、服務器成員和消息內容，然後單擊“保存更改”。
DiscordBot.Step13: 單擊“重置令牌”，然後單擊“是，執行此操作！”，然後將令牌複製到此框中：
DiscordBot.Step15: 現在，單擊此文本右側的按鈕將機器人添加到您的私人服務器之一。{LB}{LB}注意：如果您將機器人添加到公共服務器，那麼任何人都可以控制您的服務器！相反，將機器人添加到私人服務器！
DiscordBot.AddBotToServer: 將機器人添加到服務器
DiscordBot.HelpText1: 幾秒鐘後，seDirector 機器人就會出現在您的 Discord 服務器中。以下是您可以使用的命令：
DiscordBot.HelpText2: !servers OR !status OR !s OR sed_servers OR sed_status OR sed_s - 顯示所有服務器的列表
DiscordBot.HelpText3: 對於以下命令，您可以指定服務器列表中的服務器編號，也可以鍵入單詞“all”以將該命令應用於所有服務器。
DiscordBot.HelpText6: !restart OR sed_restart - 重新啟動服務器
DiscordBot.IconText: 獎勵：轉到此 URL，保存圖像，然後在“常規信息”中將“應用程序圖標”設置為圖像
DiscordBot.CopiedToClipboard: 圖標 URL 已復製到剪貼板。

Notifications.RunningNotAttached: {0} is running and is Not attached to seDirector. Click OK to terminate the process or cancel to exit seDirector.
Notifications.ShortcutError: 建立捷徑時發生錯誤，請確定您有訪問桌面的權限。
Notifications.ShortcutErrorSM: There was an error creating the shortcut. Please make sure you have access to the start menu.
Notifications.SteamUsernamePasswordChanged: The Steam username or password has changed. Please enter the Steam Guard code (sent to your e-mail) on the following window if asked. Do Not close out of the next window, let it close automatically. If you mess up, just press backspace to correct.{LB}{LB}If you need the code to be sent again, press Ctrl-C one time and let it close automatically, set your username to something else, Save, then change it back to the correct value, Save.
Notifications.CannotUseRootDirectoryOfDrive: You cannot use the root directory of a drive.
Notifications.PleaseSelectSrcdsInGameDirectory: Please select srcds.exe in the game's directory.
Notifications.MaxStartAttemptsReached: Cannot start after {0} attempts. User required.
Notifications.MaxCrashesOccurred: Server crashed {0} times in a row. User required.
Notifications.SecondCrashInTenMinutesUpdating: 2nd crash in 10 minutes - attempting to update server
Notifications.ErrorServerRecommendation: Run an update on the server to see if that fixes the problem. If that does not fix it there may be a problem with an addon or plugin. Check the server's error logs for more information.
Notifications.DetectedNotResponding: Detected not responding, retrying in 10 seconds
Notifications.PendingRestartTimeout: 自重新啟動請求以來已超過{0}秒，強制伺服器重新啟動
Notifications.PendingUpdateTimeout: 自更新請求以來已超過{0}秒，強制更新
Notifications.AreYouSureTerminate: Are you sure you want to terminate all instances of {0}.exe?
Notifications.AllInstancesOf: All instances of {0}.exe have been terminated if they existed.
Notifications.QuitConfirm: There are servers running or updating. If you exit, all servers will be stopped. Are you sure you want to exit?
Notifications.ErrorStartingServerRecommendation: Error 1009: There was an error starting {0}. Make sure the port you are using is an available port (one port per server per host) and that the IP address is valid. If you still experience problems, try updating the server or running the server manually to correct the problem. Sometimes a lower version of SourceMod or Metamod is required in order to run the game.
Notifications.ErrorStartingUpdateRecommendation: Error 1010: There was an error starting an update on server {0}. We've found the most common problem is that the "Automatically detect settings" checkbox is unchecked in Internet Options->Connections->LAN Settings. If it is checked, redownload {1}. Launch {1} through a command prompt for more information. Sometimes a lower version of SourceMod or Metamod is required in order to run the game.{LB}{LB}Here's the {1} command line w/arguments:{LB}{LB}{1}.exe {2}
Notifications.QuitServerForUpdateConfirmation: Server {0} is currently running.{LB}{LB}Do you want to stop the server to proceed with updating?
Notifications.DeleteServerConfirmation: 您確定要刪除伺服器 {0} 嗎?
Notifications.EmailInfo: If e-mail alerts are enabled on a server, you'll receive alerts from alerts@sedirector.com automatically. No need to bother with SMTP settings - e-mail notifications are included as part of your seDirector account.
Notifications.NewerVersionAvailable: A newer version of seDirector is available.{LB}{LB}Current Version: {0}{LB}New Version: {1}{LB}{LB}Would you like to update seDirector? Your servers will continue to run during the seDirector update process.
Notifications.AutomaticUpdateInfo: seDirector supports the ability to update a server automatically when Steam's servers have an update available. For this to work you must have SourceMod installed with the SteamTools extension and the seDirector plugin.{LB}{LB}Press OK to open the seDirector plugin page.
Notifications.FileDoesNotExist: {0} does not exist in the specified location.
Notifications.GameServerDirectoryMissing: The game directory for server {0} is missing. Please select srcds.exe again.
Notifications.UpdateToolMissing: {0} is missing. Please go to Tools->Options to set the location of {0}.
Notifications.UpdateToolNotSelected: An update tool has not been selected for {0}. Please go to the Automation tab in the server's properties to select an update tool.
Notifications.ServerBeingCreated: 現在將創建服務器。請等待安裝程序完成，然後在服務器屬性窗口中選擇 srcds.exe。
Notifications.ServerBeingCreatedTF2C: TF2 Classic 將與基礎服務器文件一起下載、解壓和安裝。請等待安裝程序完成，然後在服務器屬性窗口中選擇 srcds.exe。

Notifications.NoUpdateToolSet: An update tool has not been set on {0} of your servers. Please set the update tool in the Automation tab of the server's properties.

Notifications.AddonBackupFailure: Error 2017: Error when backing up the existing addon. Please try again.

Login.PasswordEightChars: 請使用至少 8 個字符的密碼。

ServerProperties.MetamodSource: Metamod:Source is a C++ plugin environment for Half-Life 2. It acts as a 'metamod' which sits in between the Game and the Engine, and allows plugins to intercept calls that flow between. It provides a mechanism called SourceHook, a very powerful library for intercepting, overridding, and superseding virtual function calls.
ServerProperties.SourceMod: SourceMod is server modification for any game that runs on the Half-Life 2 engine. It is a powerful, highly optimized platform for scripting plugins and handling server administration. The default package comes with a base set of plugins, but there are thousands of plugins in the community.
ServerProperties.VersionListEmpty: The {0} version list is empty. To fix this, simply restart seDirector, wait 5 seconds, then open the server's properties again. Would you like to restart seDirector? Running servers will remain running.
ServerProperties.ErrorInstallingAddon: Error installing addon. Check your Internet connection and try again.
ServerProperties.TaskConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove task {0}?
ServerProperties.RemovingMetamodAffectSourcemod: Removing Metamod will stop SourceMod from working. You must remove SourceMod first.
ServerProperties.RemovingULibAffectULX: Removing ULib will stop ULX from working. You must remove ULX first.
ServerProperties.WarningAllDataDeleted: WARNING: All add-on data will be deleted.
ServerProperties.AddonCouldNotBeDetected: Addon could not be detected. Make sure you have permission to write to {0} and rerun the Install/Change process.
ServerProperties.DoesNotExistClick: Does not exist. Click here to create it.
ServerProperties.ProblemFileNotExist: Problem opening file. File does not exist.

ServerProperties.SWU_EXAMPLE: Specify the exact path to the game directory directory that contains the maps, sound, etc, subdirectory.{LB}{LB}For example:{LB}/var/www/yourdomain.com/assets/tf2{LB}would be accessible via HTTP at{LB}http://yourdomain.com/assets/tf2/{LB}{LB}Use the Test Connection button to ensure you can connect and that you have specified the correct directory.
ServerProperties.CS2_Plugin_Info:
With CS2, the server hibernates before the seDirector plugin has a chance to turn that off. You must set sv_hibernate_when_empty to 0 in your cfg file that starts the server, otherwise the seDirector plugin will NOT work.

If you don't set this cvar to 0:
(1) Updates will not occur until a player joins
(2) After players are notified in-game of a server update, if all leave before the countdown reaches 0, your server will never update
(3) Because of 1+2, this causes an endless loop of in-game updates and thus an outdated server

You cannot simply turn off hibernation later, it must be done in the cfg file that launches when your server runs.

Add this line to your cfg file and make sure it's not anywhere else:
sv_hibernate_when_empty 0
ServerProperties.YouHaveSelectedActionSedirectorPlugin: You've selected an action that can only be used if the seDirector plugin is installed. Please make sure to install this before you save the task, otherwise you will run into issues.
ServerProperties.SelectDestinationDirSync: Select the destination directory for directory synchronization
ServerProperties.UseFormatBelowNotifEmail: Use the format below as your notification e-mail address.
ServerProperties.PleaseEnterServerNameProp: Please enter a server name in the Properties tab before testing notifications.
ServerProperties.PleaseEnterEmailAddressTesting: Please enter an e-mail address before testing notifications.
ServerProperties.PleaseCheckDiscordWebhook: Please check the Discord webhook URL and try again.
ServerProperties.DiscordWebhookMoreInfo: A Discord webhook is required in order for this to work. If you don't already have a Discord server for these notifications, create a new Discord server. Once created, go into the Discord server (or channel) settings, click on Integrations, and click 'New Webhook'. Copy the webhook URL and paste it into seDirector.
ServerProperties.ServerCfgAlreadyExist: Server.cfg already exists in this game's cfg directory, do you want to save it as server.cfg.example instead?
ServerProperties.ErrorInstallingPlugin: Error 1007: Error installing plugin. Please make sure you have access to the plugins directory.
ServerProperties.ErrorRemovingPlugin: Error 1008: Error removing plugin. Please make sure no other programs are using this plugin. Close out of any Windows Explorer instances you may have open. Restart the computer if necessary.
ServerProperties.AnotherPropertiesWindowOpen: Another properties window is already open. Please close the other window before opening a new one.

ServerProperties.AnUpdateToolHasNotBeenSelected: An update tool has not been selected. {0} is the default tool for {1}, would you like to update using that?

ServerProperties.FTPSyncFieldMissing: Enable FTP Synchronization is checked but there's a field missing information. Check the fields at the bottom of the Optimization tab.

Troubleshooting.ServerStartsNormally: This server appears to start normally.{LB}{LB}Continue troubleshooting?
Troubleshooting.TestPassedWithoutAdditionalParameters: Test passed. Server started successfully without the Additional Parameters. Something in your Additional Parameters is causing a problem when starting the server.
Troubleshooting.TestFailedWithoutAdditionalParameters: Test failed. Server did not start successfully, even with Additional Parameters disabled.
Troubleshooting.CouldNotDisableAddons: Error 3600. Could not disable addons. Please restart your computer and try again.
Troubleshooting.CouldNotEnableAddons: Error 3601. Could not enable addons. You will need to manually rename 'addons_testing_renamed' to 'addons' to re-enable your addons.
Troubleshooting.RunningServerWithoutAdditionalParameters: Troubleshoot: running server without additional parameters
Troubleshooting.RunningServerWithoutACAP: Troubleshoot: running server without addons, cfg file, additional parameters
Troubleshooting.TestPassedWithoutACAP: Test passed. Server started successfully without addons, cfg, and Additional Parameters. Something in addons, cfg, and/or Additional Parameters is causing a problem starting the server.{LB}{LB}Note: this test does not test SourceMod cfg files, please check those as well if you have SourceMod.
Troubleshooting.TestFailedWithoutACAP: Test failed. Server did not start successfully, even with addons, cfg, and Additional Parameters disabled.{LB}{LB}Note: this test does not test SourceMod cfg files, please check those as well if you have SourceMod.
Troubleshooting.TestPassedWithoutAddons: Test passed. Server started successfully without the addons folder. Something inside the addons folder is causing a problem when starting the server. This problem could be caused by a cfg file related to an addon so check the cfg folder as well.
Troubleshooting.TestFailedWithoutAddons: Test failed. Server did not start successfully, even with addons disabled.
